title: Login and View Profile
custom_steps:
1. Log in to test environment with club-nyy-mjc-admin/club-nyy-mjc-admin
2. Click Search on the left nav 
3. Search for Professional Player, filter Org/Club Equals NYY
4. Click on a professional player whose Roster Status is Active
custom_expected:
1. Dashboard load 
2. Advanced Search loads 
3. List of Org's Professional Players shows in advanced Search Results 
4. Profile loads successfully

title: Create New Major Contract
custom_steps:
1. Click contract tab. 
2. On the Contract History widget, click Create New then select Major Contract.
custom_expected:
1. User sees contract history table for selected player 
2. New Contract loads for the player. Contract Header displays as: Last Name, Roster First Name, POS, Team Name, Level of Play, Current MLS and Status.

title: Contract Type- Negotiated
custom_steps:
1.Select Negotiated for Contract Type (Default Value)
2. Select Current year for Starting Year (Default Value) 
3. Enter 3 for Non-Option Years 
4. Enter 2 for Option Years 
5. Click Refresh Contract
custom_expected:
1. Contract type displays as: Arbitration, Negotiated, Renewed, and Tendered. Negotiated set as default.
2. User is able to select current and following years. (Cannot select a past year) 
3. Fields works as expected. (Default value= 1, Valid Values= 1-99) 
4. Field works as expected. (Default value= 0, Valid Values= 0-99)
5. System refreshes contract and adds the years entered to the corresponding sections.

title: Contract Dates
custom_steps:
1. Select Signing Date (Format= mm/dd/yyyy)
2. Select Life Insur. Prov. Signed (Format= mm/dd/yyyy)
custom_expected:
1. System populates date from dropdown calendar (default= blank)
2. System populates date from dropdown calendar (default= blank)

title: Club and Agency Info
custom_steps:
1. Select Signing Org. from dropdown list
2. Select Signing Agency from dropdown list
3. Once signing agency is selected, signing agent can then be chosen from dropdown list
4. If, Agent not listed is selected, fill in agent manually in comment box
custom_expected:
1. Defaults to current org. if player has been previously signed. Displays newly selected org. if changed.
2. Displays selected agency.
3. Displays selected agent.
4. Comment box appears if Agent not listed is selected. Text can be entered in newly populated box.

title: Comments
custom_steps: Enter comments in to comments field.
custom_expected: Comments section populates with text.

title: Settlement
custom_steps: Verify checkbox button. Make sure to check and uncheck.
custom_expected: Default should be unchecked.

title: Add Negotiator/signatory Verify the link
custom_steps: Verify that the link opens to a new window. Click on Add Negotiator/Signatory button.
custom_expected: Link signatory/signatory opens a new page.

title: Major League Comp- Base Salary and Guaranteed
custom_steps:
1. Click on Major League Compensation section.
2. Enter value in for Base Salary for each contract year
3. Enter value in for Guaranteed for each contract year
4. (Optional) Enter value for Other Compensation for one or all contract years.
custom_expected:
1. System expands the Major league Compensation section and displays relevant compensation of each year of the contract.
2. Displays numbers entered for each year (Default value= 0, Valid Amount= Up to 9 characters)
3. Displays numbers entered for each year (Default value= 0, Valid Amount= Up to 9 characters)
4. (Optional) Displays numbers entered for each year (Default value= 0, Valid Amount= Up to 9 characters)

title: Non-Guaranteed Field
custom_steps:
1. Enter 1000 into Base Salary field and enter 600 into Guaranteed field.
2. Observe change in Non-Guaranteed Value.
3. Update Guaranteed field to 2000 (leaving Base Salary as 1000).
4. Observe change in Non-Guaranteed Value.
custom_expected:
1/2. Non-Guaranteed field displays 400, and contract is able to be submitted successfully.
3/4. Non-Guaranteed field displays -1000, and contract is NOT able to be submitted. Error Message displayed stating "Guaranteed Salary cannot be higher than Base Salary".

title: LRD Salary and Pro-Rated Check Box
custom_steps:
1. Verify change in LRD Salary based on salary calculations.
2. Check and Uncheck Pro-Rated Check Box.
custom_expected:
1. Calculated by the system "On Save" based on salary entered for contract years. (Default= 0)
2. Should be able to check and uncheck box. Default= checked.

title: Comments
custom_steps: Enter Texts on the Comments field
custom_expected: Comments field was populated.

title: AAV
custom_steps: Annual avarage salary
custom_expected:
Default value = 0
Will auto populate based on values in Compensation

title: Bonus Max
custom_steps: Enter Value for the maximum amount of bonuses that can be earned that year.

title: Minor Leauge Comp
custom_steps:
1. Click on Minor League Compensation section. 
2. Enter value into AAA.
3. Observe toggle button turn to "Yes"
custom_expected:
1. System expands the Minor league Compensation Section. 
2. Able to enter value, once value entered into AAA, the rest of the fields auto-populate. (AA, 1A, 1F, SA, RA, R)
3. System automatically toggles button to "Yes" when values are entered.

title: Note
custom_steps: If a player has an approved MN league contract, corresponding values should be displayed on Major Contract

title: Option Section
custom_steps:
1. Click on option section. 
2. Enter text into comment box.
custom_expected:
1. System expands options section.
2. Text is able to be entered into comment box.

title: Add Clause and Select Option Type
custom_preconds:
At least 1 option year must be entered for the contract
[C57128]
custom_steps:
1. Click on "Add Clause"
2. Select Club, Player, or Mutual Option from dropdown list.
3. Create a clause for each possible option year(s) using the dropdown.
custom_expected:
1. System adds a blank option clause to the contract.
2. Option fields for selected options display. (Default= Club)
3. Displays all the possible option year(s) for each clause. Option years begin the year after the non-option years end.

title: Base Salary, Guaranteed, and Non-Guaranteed
custom_steps:
1. Enter value in for Base Salary for each option year per clause.
2. Enter value in for Guaranteed for each option year per clause.
3. (Optional) Enter value for Other Compensation for one or all option years.
4. To check non-guaranteed field, Enter 1000 for Base Salary and 600 for Guaranteed.
custom_expected:
1. Displays numbers entered for each year (Default value= 0, Valid Amount= Up to 9 characters)
2. Displays numbers entered for each year (Default value= 0, Valid Amount= Up to 9 characters)
3. (Optional) Displays numbers entered for each year (Default value= 0, Valid Amount= Up to 9 characters)
4. Non-Guaranteed field displays 400, and contract is able to be submitted successfully.

title: LRD Salary and Pro-Rated Check Box
custom_steps:
1. Verify change in LRD Salary based on salary calculations for each clause.
2. Check and Uncheck Pro-Rated Check Box for each clause.
custom_expected:
1. Calculated by the system on "Save" based on the salary entered. Default= 0
2. Should be able to check and uncheck box. Default= unchecked. *Note: Pro-rated check boxes are linked, if one is checked then all will be checked and visa versa.*

title: Days After World Series and Buyout
custom_steps:
1. Select Days after World Serious Option clause will be exercised. 
2. Enter Buyout amount if player chooses to decline.
3. Select "Mutual" option, notice two drop-downs appear. 
4. Enter Player days after world series using dropdown and Club days after world series using drop-down.
custom_expected:
1. System should display number chosen. Default= blank, Valid #1-90
2. System displays entered value.
3. Player Days After World Series and Club Days After World Series should appear.
4. *ONLY when Mutual option type is selected*; System displays entered days. Default= blank, Valid #1-90

title: Duplicate, Toggle Button, and Trash Can
custom_steps:
1. Click Duplicate button on clause.
2. Notice that once a clause is entered to the option section of the contract, the toggle button changes to "Yes"
3. Click Trash Can next to an option clause.
custom_expected:
1. The selected clause is duplicated exactly with all the information that was entered.
2. Toggled button changed to "YES" if a clause is entered.
3. Clause is deleted.

title: Bonus Max
custom_steps: Enter max amount for bonus that player can receive for that year

title: Option Type - Conditional Option
custom_preconds:
At least 1 option year must be entered for the contract
[C57128]
custom_steps:
1. Click on "Add Clause"
2. Select Conditional Option from dropdown list.
3. Create a clause for each possible option year(s) using the dropdown.
custom_expected:
1. System adds a blank option clause to the contract.
2. Option fields for selected options display. (Default= Club)
3. Displays all the possible option year(s) for each clause. Option years begin the year after the non-option years end.

title: Base Salary, Guaranteed, and Non-Guaranteed
custom_steps:
1. Enter value in for Base Salary for each option year per clause.
2. Enter value in for Guaranteed for each option year per clause.
3. (Optional) Enter value for Other Compensation for one or all option years.
4. To check non-guaranteed field, Enter 1000 for Base Salary and 600 for Guaranteed.
custom_expected:
1. Displays numbers entered for each year (Default value= 0, Valid Amount= Up to 9 characters)
2. Displays numbers entered for each year (Default value= 0, Valid Amount= Up to 9 characters)
3. (Optional) Displays numbers entered for each year (Default value= 0, Valid Amount= Up to 9 characters)
4. Non-Guaranteed field displays 400, and contract is able to be submitted successfully.

title: LRD Salary and Pro-Rated Check Box
custom_steps:
1. Verify change in LRD Salary based on salary calculations for each clause.
2. Check and Uncheck Pro-Rated Check Box for each clause.
custom_expected:
1. Calculated by the system on "Save" based on the salary entered. Default= 0
2. Should be able to check and uncheck box. Default= unchecked. Note: Pro-rated check boxes are linked, if one is checked then all will be checked and visa versa.

title: Start/End Year, Threshold/Place Finished, Instance, and Criteria
custom_steps:
1. Verify the start year with the dropdown. 
2. Verify the end year with the dropdown.
3. Enter value in Threshold/Place Finished field.
4. Select the Instance from dropdown. (The number of times the condition is met)
5. Select Criteria for option year from dropdown.
custom_expected:
1. Start year is defaulted to the first year of the contract and dropdown contains all option and non-option years.
2. End year is defaulted to the first year of the contract and dropdown contains all option and non-option years. 
3. System displays entered value. Default= 1
4. System should display selected instance. Default= blank, Valid= 1-10
5. System displays selected criteria for option.

title: Add/Delete Term and Select Expression
custom_steps:
1. Click add term button for option clause.
2. With new term added, fill in Threshold/Place Finished and Criteria.
3. Change expression using dropdown to "Or".
4. Click trash can next to a term.
custom_expected:
1. Blank term appears under already existing term. 
2. System displays added values.
3. Expression changes to "Or", Default= "And".
4. System deleted selected term completely.

*There should only be one instance for expression of the dropdown for multiple terms.*

title: If Met Will Become
custom_steps:
1. Select Mutual, Club, or Player for If Met will Become.
2. Enter in required fields for selected type.
3. Enter in Buyout Amount.
custom_expected:
1. System saves choice and sets other fields to selected type. (Default= Mutual) Fields for Mutual include: Player days after World Series and Club days after World Series.
2. System displays selections. 
3. Buyout Amount displayed.

*Date Earned generated by system once contract is in an Approved State*
*Official Check Box not editable until contract has a status of Approved*

title: Duplicate and Trash Can
custom_steps:
1. Click Duplicate button.
2. Click the trash can next to a clause.
custom_expected:
1. The selected clause is duplicated exactly with all the information that was entered.
2. Clause is deleted completely.

title: Start/End Year, Threshold/Place Finished, Instance, and Criteria
custom_steps:
1. Verify the start year with the dropdown.
2. Verify the end year with the dropdown.
3. Enter value in Threshold/Place Finished field.
4. Select the Instance from dropdown. (The number of times the condition is met)
5. Select Criteria for option year from dropdown.
custom_expected:
1. Start year is defaulted to the first year of the contract and dropdown contains all option and non-option years.
2. End year is defaulted to the first year of the contract and dropdown contains all option and non-option years.
3. System displays entered value. Default= 1
4. System should display selected instance. Default= blank, Valid= 1-10
5. System displays selected criteria for option.

title: Add/Delete Term, Select Expression, and Buyout Amount
custom_steps:
1. Click add term button for option clause.
2. With new term added, fill in Threshold/Place Finished and Criteria.
3. Change expression using dropdown to "Or".
4. Click trash can next to a term.
5. Enter value for Buyout Amount.
custom_expected:
1. Blank term appears under already existing term.
2. System displays added values.
3. Expression changes to "Or", Default= "And".
4. System deleted selected term completely.
5. System displays Buyout Amount. 

*There should only be one instance for expression of the dropdown for multiple terms.*
*Date Earned generated by system once contract is in an Approved State*
*Official Check Box not editable until contract has a status of Approved*

title: Duplicate and Trash Can
custom_steps:
1. Click Duplicate button.
2. Click the trash can next to a clause.
custom_expected:
1. The selected clause is duplicated exactly with all information that was entered.
2. Clause is deleted completely.

title: Signing Bonus
custom_steps:
1. Click on Signing Bonus section.
2. Enter Value into Total Signing Bonus.
3. Select Payment Date from dropdown Calendar.
4. Enter value in Within # Days of Approval.
custom_expected:
1. System expands Signing Bonus Section.
2. System displays entered amount.
3. Date appears in field.
4. Payment Date disappears and entered value is shown in Within # Days of Approval. 

*Note: Once values are entered, Toggle Button switches to "Yes"*

title: Award Bonuses Add Clause
custom_steps:
1. Click on Award Bonus section.
2. Click Add Clause.
3. Note that the number of the clause goes in consecutive order.
custom_expected:
1. System expands Award Bonus section.
2. Blank clause opens.
3. Starts with AB1 then AB2 and so on.

*Note: Once values are entered, Toggle Button switches to "Yes"*

title: Year, Place Finished, Instance, Award, and Amount
custom_steps:
1. Select "All" for Year 
2. Click dropdown to verify other years
3. Enter value for Place Finished
4. Enter value for Instance
5. Use dropdown to select an Award
6. Enter a value in for the Amount
custom_expected:
1. This is the option and non-option years combined. Default= "All"
2. All years of the contract should be in dropdown.
3. System displays value. Default= 1
4. System displays value. Default= blank
5. Award is displayed.
6. Amount is displayed.

title: Add/Delete Term and Select Expression
custom_steps:
1. Click Add Term button
2. Enter in empty fields of new term (Year, Place Finished, Instance, and Award)
3. Select an expression ("And"/"Or")
4. Click on the trash can next to a term
custom_expected:
1. Term row is added under current row
2. Values displayed.
3. Expression is set. Default= "And"
4. Term is deleted from clause

title: Place Finished Table
custom_steps:
1. Select just one Year for the clause
2. Select an Award from the dropdown list
3. Click Place Finished Table button *(Only one year must be selected in order for this button to work)*
4. Click Add Term button twice
5. Put a 1 for the first place field, a 2 for the second, and a 3 for the third
6. Enter Amounts for each place finished
7. Click Delete table
custom_expected:
1. Year is selected and Place Finished Table button becomes active
2. Selected Award is displayed
3. Place Finished table appears below Term
4. Two new rows are added to the table
5/6. Values are displayed.
7. Table is deleted.

*Club Give and Official check boxes are not editable until contract is in an approved state*

title: Duplicate or Delete Clause
custom_steps:
1. Click the Duplicate button and click "Clause"
2. Click the Duplicate button and click "Next Contract Year"
3. Click the trash can next to the clause
custom_expected:
1. A replicated clause is added. Note: "Clause" or "Next Contract Year" could be selected
2. A replicated clause is added BUT for the next contract year that the contract follows.
3. Clause is deleted completely.

title: Add Maximums Table
custom_steps:
1. Click on the Add Maximums Table button
2. User selects the clause(s) for which they wish to set a Maximum in the Maximum Group field and sets the Maximum to a numeric Amount or to be equal to the amount in the Largest Clause
3. User clicks Add Row (Optional Step)
4. User clicks the trash can icon on any row (Optional Step)
5. User clicks Delete Table (Optional Step)
custom_expected:
1. Maximums table is now opened beneath the Comments section with one row already added
2. System displays the entered information
3. System adds another row to the Maximums Table. Each row is treated separately.
4. System removes the selected row from the Maximums Table.
5. System removes the entire Maximums Table from the contract.

title: Comments
custom_steps: Enter text in comments section.
custom_expected: Text was added to the comments section.

title: Performance Bonuses Add Clause
custom_steps:
1. Click on Performance Bonuses section
2. Click Add Clause
3. Notice the Term number starts at one and when another clause is added the numbers are consecutive
custom_expected:
1. System expand Performance Bonuses section, and shows a Point System Definitions list. 
2. A blank clause is displayed.
3. Clause starts with 1, and then goes to 2, 3, ext. 

*Note: Once values are entered, Toggle Button switches to "Yes"*

title: Start/End Year, Threshold, Criteria, and Amount
custom_steps:
1. Select a Start Year from dropdown
2. Select a End Year from dropdown
3. Enter a value for Threshold
4. Select Criteria from dropdown
5. Enter a value in Amount for which the player will receive if the criteria is met
custom_expected:
1. System displays selected year. Default= First contract year, Years listed are years of the contract 
2. System displays selected year. Default= First contract year, Years listed are years of the contract
3. System displays entered value for Threshold. Default= blank
4. System displays selected Criteria. 
5. System displays entered value in Amount. Default= blank

*Club Give, Date and Amount Earned, and Official check box are not editable until the contract is Approved*

title: Add/Delete Term and Select Expression
custom_steps:
1. Click Add Term 
2. Fill in Info for newly added term
3. Select "Add" or "Or" from Expression dropdown
4. Click the trash can next to a term
custom_expected:
1. A new blank term row appears under existing term.
2. Values that are entered are displayed.
3. System displays selected expression. Default= "And" 
4. Term row is deleted.

title: Threshold Table
custom_steps:
1. Click Threshold Table, *Button is active if there is only one term for the clause*
2. Click Add Term on table twice
3. Enter values for Threshold and Amount on table
4. Click trash can next to a row on the table
5. Click Delete Table
custom_expected:
1. Threshold table appears under Term row on clause. (Threshold Field states TABLE)
2. Two rows are added on the table.
3. Values entered are displayed.
4. The row is deleted off the table.
5. The table is deleted completely.

*Club Give, Date and Amount Earned, and Official check box are not editable until the contract is Approved*

title: Duplicate and Trash Can
custom_steps:
1. Click Duplicate button
2. Select "Clause"
3. Click Duplicate button again
4. Select "Next Contract Year"
5. Click Trash Can next to clause
custom_expected:
1. Button shows two choices "Clause" or "Next Contract Year".
2. A new clause is added to the section with the info filled in from the previous selected clause.
3. Again button shows two choices.
4. A clause is added with the info filled in from the previous section for the next contract year though.
5. Clause is deleted completely.

title: Duplicate and Trash Can
custom_steps:
1. Click Duplicate button
2. Select "Clause"
3. Click Duplicate button again
4. Select "Next Contract Year"
5. Click Duplicate button one last time
6. Select "All Contract Years"
7. Click Trash Can next to clause
custom_expected:
1. Button shows three choices "Clause", "Next Contract Year", or "All Contract Years".
2. A new clause is added to the section with the info filled in from the previous selected clause.
3. Again button shows three choices.
4. A clause is added with the info filled in from the previous section for the next contract year though.
5. Button shows three choices.
6. A clause is added with the info filled in from the previous section but for each contract year.
7. Clause is deleted completely.

title: Add Maximum Table
custom_steps:
1. Click on the Add Maximums Table button
2. User selects the clause(s) for which they wish to set a Maximum in the Maximum Group field and sets the Maximum to a numeric Amount or to be equal to the amount in the Largest Clause
3. User clicks Add Row (Optional Step)
4. User clicks the trash can icon on any row (Optional Step)
5. User clicks Delete Table (Optional Step)
custom_expected:
1. Maximums table is now opened beneath the Comments section with one row already added
2. System displays the entered information
3. System adds another row to the Maximums Table. Each row is treated separately.
4. System removes the selected row from the Maximums Table.
5. System removes the entire Maximums Table from the contract.

title: Comments
custom_steps: Enter texts in comments section.
custom_expected: Texts was added to the comments section.

title: Covenants
custom_steps:
1. Click Covenants section on contract
2. Click the trash can next to a few of the covenants
3. Click Add Section button and select the covenants to the section
custom_expected:
1. System expands Covenants section. All Covenants are displayed.
2. Covenants are removed from section.
3. Covenants are added back to the section.

title: Comments
custom_steps: Enter Texts on the Comments field
custom_expected: Comments field is populated.

title: Guarantee Provision
custom_steps:
1. Click the "No" next to Guarantee Provision
2. Enter text into Printed Title
custom_expected:
1. Button turns green and is toggled to "Yes". 
2. System displays entered text.

*User must have Guaranteed Provision if guaranteed compensation is included*

title: No-Trade Add Clause
custom_steps:
1. Click No-Trade section
2. Click Add Clause
3. Notice Clause number starts at one and when another clause is added the numbers are consecutive
custom_expected:
1. No-Trade section expanded.
2. A blank clause is added.
3. Clause starts with 1, and then goes to 2, 3, ext.

*Note: Once values are entered, Toggle Button switches to "Yes"*

title: Limited No-Trade
custom_steps:
1. Select "Limited No-Trade" from dropdown next to trash can
2. Enter in number of teams the player can or cannot be traded too
3. Select the Assignment type from the dropdown
custom_expected:
1. Number of fields appear. Default= Limited No-trade
2. Value entered is displayed.
3. Assignment type selected is displayed. Default= No Trade Teams, Options= No Trade Teams or Valid Trade Teams

title: Effective Date Range, Submitted by Date, and Organizations
custom_steps:
1. Enter an Effective Date Range using dropdown calendars
2. Select a year from the dropdown for End of Season
3. Select a Submit by Date from dropdown calendar
4. Select Organizations to meet Assignment type from dropdown list of all of the clubs
custom_expected:
1. Date is populated in fields.
2. If a year is selected for "Or for End of Season", year is displayed and Effective Date Range disappears.
3. Date is populated in field.
4. Organizations are displayed. The number of teams is determined by the value entered in the "# of Teams" field.

title: Full No-Trade
custom_steps:
1. Select "Full No-Trade" from dropdown next to trash can
2. Enter Years into field from dropdown
custom_expected:
1. Years field appears. Default= blank
2. Years displayed. The years in dropdown are the contract years, more than one year may be selected.

title: Trash Can
custom_steps: 1. Click trash can next to a clause
custom_expected: 1. Clause is deleted from section.

custom_steps: Add a new clause to the Assignment Covenant
custom_expected: System able to Add new clause to the Assignment Covenant

custom_expected: Criteria drop down field populates.

 Blank contract years (guaranteed + option)

custom_expected:

title: Charitable Contribution
custom_steps:
1. Click on the Charitable Contributions section
2. Click on a radio button for which contribution is relevant
3. Enter value into field if radio button permits
4. Click View Guidelines button
custom_expected:

title: Executed Contract Add File
custom_steps:
1. Click on Executed Contract
2. Click Browse
3. Select a file to upload, click Open/Ok
4. Verify "Drop Files" section by dragging a file from your desktop into this section
custom_expected:

2. System opens up file browser where you can search through your files on your computer.
3. File is selected and uploaded onto contract.
4. File is uploaded successfully.

title: Add Label to Uploaded File
custom_steps:
1. Select a Label from the dropdown
2. Add a Comment if necessary using blurb bubble
3. Click the trash can
custom_expected:
1. File name is displayed. Labels are displayed. Values= Amendment, Contract, or Miscellaneous
2. Comments are displayed.
3. File is deleted.

*Last Modified will show a date if the file is changed or corrections are made to it*

title: Save or Cancel
custom_steps:
1. Click Save
2. Click Cancel
custom_expected:
1. Contract is saved with a preliminary status.
2. Contract is taken out of edit mode and changes are not saved.
